channel.description: Recent content in ops on Just a dev blog

item.title: Multi-CPU Github Actions with Go
item.description: When we think about CPU architecture usually there’s one leader that comes to our mind - the famous x86-64 one. It is the main player on our desktops and on the server side. Even more recent generation of game consoles switched to that architecture from some more exotic ones. But there are alternatives. Some are pretty well known such as the ARM one that took over the mobile market (and slowly enters the desktop world with Apple M1 laptops).
